backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining color themes and shared UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ValentinePage.
frontend/src/components/CustomDomainSect: Form-driven component that collects a domain and canister ID and generates DNS setup instructions.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsOv: Renders multiple animated floating heart emojis for decorative overlay.
frontend/src/components/PersonalMomentEf: Trigger-based visual effect overlay with sparkles and heart burst animations.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Three-image gallery component displaying themed photos.
Button that copies the current page URL to the clipboard and shows temporary confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ValentinePage.ts: Main page composing audio, animations, gallery, proposal flow, sharing, and custom domain navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and exposing login/clear functions with status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a romantic theme, custom components, animations, and light/dark CSS variables.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeUrl.ts: Returns the current browser URL for share/copy functionality.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, domain setup plans, and state versioning.
